metadata.title: CVE-2023-2442 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 15.11 before 15.11.7, all versions starting from 16.0 before16.0.2. A specially crafted merge request could lead to a stored XSS on theclient side which allows attackers to perform arbitrary actions on behalfof victims.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
